page.title: 10The Village Hall and Us
page.content: Built in 1972 it is used every day including some Sundays. After the Church and school it is the hub of village life. The Sports pavillion is run separately, but in conjunction with the Hall. Tennis and cricket are keenly supported in the village, and as with the bellringers, social events are held at the Hall. The W.I., Old Time dancers and Friendship Club all meet regularly at the Hall, and the Youth Club use the Hall for most months of the year, as do the artists and gardeners. The Hall committee organises a large flower show annually and bingo every week. The Playgroup hold their sessions in the Hall, and a doctor's surgery is held once a week. Outsiders use the Hall regularly, and it is also used for plays and voting.The Hall abutts the recreation ground and sports areas.
